## getStripePayments() function

Serves as the main entry point to this library. Initializes the client SDK, and returns a handle object that can be passed into other APIs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getStripePayments(app: FirebaseApp, options: StripePaymentsOptions): StripePayments;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | FirebaseApp | A FirebaseApp instance initialized by the Firebase JS SDK. |
|  options | [StripePaymentsOptions](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepaymentsoptions.md) | Configuration options for the SDK. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md)

An instance of the StripePayments class.
